name: The first Camel AI Detective
description:
Camel Tech is proud to present the first ever AI detective in the world!

Our highly sophisticated artificial intelligence will scan the suspect face, and confront it with the photo in our database. The powerful algorithm will then check for differences in the two images, and determine if the suspect is guilty or innocent.

How it works?

The ai will:

  • Press the "I" button to signal an innocent
  • Press the "G" button to let us know that the suspect is guilty
  • Press the "E" button many times to enlarge the photo if it needs it
  • To accept or deny calls it will press the "A" or "D" buttons
  • In any other circumstance, any button will do
